|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|TP-LINK Archer C8 v1.x}} Observed default SSID format on multiple labels conflicts with a previous editors contribution (TP-LINK_2.4GHz_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHz_XXXXXX).. :Different regions may possibly vary SSID format (maybe) ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32604-tp-link-archer-c9-reviewed Review on '''SmallNetBuilder''']

Switch	In BCM4709		In BCM4708
RAM	128 MB			128 MB
Flash	16 MB			16 MB
2.4 GHz Broadcom BCM4360	Broadcom BCM4331
Radio - Skyworks PA (x3)	Unident. PA (x3)
5 GHz 	Broadcom BCM4360	Broadcom BCM4360
Radio - SiGE 5003L1 PA (x3)	SiGE 5003L1 PA (x3)
